app.title: JSON l10n Diff Tool
app.subtitle: Side-by-side JSON comparison with unified tree view

upload.dragDrop: Drag & drop a JSON file here, or click to select
upload.maxSize: File size must be less than {size} MB

comparison.emptyState: Upload two JSON files to compare

instructions.title: Features:
instructions.step1: Uses File 1's keys as the primary structure
instructions.step2: Shows values from both files for each key
instructions.step3c: Light blue = Missing in File 1 (temporary keys)
instructions.step4: Click "+ Add" button to add missing keys to either file
instructions.step5: Keys that exist in File 2 but not in File 1 are shown with "(temp)" badge
instructions.step6: Click arrows to expand/collapse nested objects
instructions.step7: Buttons at the top for bulk operations

about.title: About JSON l10n Diff Tool
about.description: A powerful tool for comparing and analyzing differences between JSON localization files.
about.author: Author

actions.addKeyToFile1: Add key "{keyPath}" to File 1 with value: {value}
actions.addKeyToFile2: Add key "{keyPath}" to File 2 with value: {value}

errors.bothFilesRequired: Both files must be loaded before running comparison
